name: Action Loops
description:
Action Loops puts the hottest drum loops and samples at your fingertips.

Action Loops is a fun & creative drum loop machine. Play cool & hot drumbeats and sound effects. Create your own hit beats. Jam directly on your iOS device. Plug in your headphones and enjoy the sounds & music.

Many different drumloops set to choose from and an easy-to-use design makes this app real fun for everyone.
